Command.name: /start
Command.Description: Initialize the Kindle Telegram Bot and get started
Command.Response:
Welcome to the Kindle Telegram Bot! Send me your Kindle email (your_email@kindle.com) to start receiving books directly on your device.
If you want to use this bot, please add the following email to your Amazon account and make it authorized to send documents:

Command.name: /set_email
Command.Description: Set your Kindle email address linked to your Telegram account for sending books
Command.Response: Please send me your Kindle device email address.

Command.name: /help
Command.Description: Show a list of available commands and how to use the bot
Command.Response:
Available commands: /start - Start the bot /set_email - Set your Kindle email /help - Show this help /stop - Stop the bot /my_email - Check your current Email
If your books aren't being delivered without error messages, make sure you have added bot email to your Amazon account and that it is authorized to send documents. This will allow the bot to send books directly to your Kindle. bot email:

Command.name: /stop
Command.Description: Stop the Kindle Telegram Bot and end the current session
Command.Response: You have stopped the Kindle Telegram Bot. Send /start to activate it again.
